Eric Schmidt has been the adult supervision at Google for 10 years, and now it's time for the founders to take over. That's what this is.

In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come," Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said."
